scenario_text.value: Kewww...
Kunemon! Talk to me, Kunemon!
Kew... Kewkew, kewww...
Aw, Kunemon... Don’t be like that, man...

Don’t you give up on me! You can do this!
You’re the best, I swear!
Kewy... kew, kewww...

Knock it off... Ain’t no way I run off and
leave you behind...
Kewww...
Say it ain’t so. Kunemon...

He means so much to me! I am going to make
you pay for this!!!

The hell’s wrong with you... Taking something
so precious like it was nothing...

You got any idea how it feels for the rest of
us?! Your crap has hurt so many people!

You should be ashamed... You punks have
friggin’ done it now!
I’ll protect Kunemon’s important place!
No matter what... I’ll make it happen!
Gewww! Gew...gew, gewww!
Kunemon?! What is it?! Hey!
The heck...? Kunemon, are you...?!

I got you... I got you, man! You and me, our
hearts...are becoming one!

Our feelings, our power, everything... It’s
all spilling out from inside me!
Gewww... Gewy, gewww?!

Yeah, it’s all good. Let ’em friggin’ have
it, Kunemon!
Gew, g-ge... GEWWWWWWWWWWWW!
Is this...for real?! Is that your new form?!

Ryo, let’s try that again. As we are now,
we’re sure to be victorious!
